TextView.android:text: PASC is the most active ACM Chapter in INDIA. PICT is one of the best colleges in Maharashtra for Computer Science, PASC is highly prestigious chapter.\n\n At PASC, we all work together as a team. We take the utmost effort for the success of each and every member of PASC. We help them to achieve not only technical superiority but also bring the best out of them in the non-technical field as well so that they become the pioneers of today's world. Since we at PASC bring our motto into reality this year we received the 'BEST ACM STUDENT CHAPTER AWARD 2018, 2019'.
